title: Select Cheapest LTL Carrier
description: A planner needs to ship three pallets and must select the most cost-effective Less-Than-Truckload (LTL) carrier.

tasks.description: Enter the shipment details: origin, destination, pallet count, dimensions, weight, and freight class.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately enters all required LTL rating data.

tasks.description: Request rates from all contracted LTL carriers via a rating API.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system retrieves quotes from five different LTL carriers.

tasks.description: Review the quotes and select the carrier with the lowest price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the cheapest carrier and books the shipment.
